name: Etsy Shop Management Notion Template
description: Now managing your Etsy account is easy with this Notion Template.Organize your beautiful Etsy business in just one place. I have created this template just for Etsy shop owners so that you can create a perfect and successful work plan for your Etsy Store. Use this simple template to track the progress of your store.
